eu.trentorise.opendata.jackan.ckan

Class CkanClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.trentorise.opendata.jackan.ckan.CkanClient

  • public class CkanClient
extends Object
    Class to access a ckan instance. Threadsafe.
    Author:
    David Leoni, Ivan Tankoyeu

      • getCatalogURL

      • makeDatasetURL

        public static String makeDatasetURL(String catalogUrl,
                    String datasetIdentifier)
        Given some dataset parameters, reconstruct the URL of dataset page in the catalog website. Valid URLs have this format with the name: http://dati.trentino.it/dataset/impianti-di-risalita-vivifiemme-2013 but it is preferable to use the id: http://dati.trentino.it/dataset/418d662e-aa94-44bc-b281-d689aeec27ac
        Parameters:
        datasetIdentifier - either the alphanumerical id of the dataset or the name. Using the id is preferable.
        Returns:

      • makeResourceURL

        public static String makeResourceURL(String catalogUrl,
                     String datasetIdentifier,
                     String resourceId)
        Given some resource parameters, reconstruct the URL of resource page in the catalog website. Valid URLs have this format with the name: http://dati.trentino.it/dataset/impianti-di-risalita-vivifiemme-2013/resource/779d1d9d-9370-47f4-a194-1b0328c32f02 but it is preferable to use the id: http://dati.trentino.it/dataset/418d662e-aa94-44bc-b281-d689aeec27ac/resource/779d1d9d-9370-47f4-a194-1b0328c32f02
        Parameters:
        catalogUrl - i.e. http://data.gov.uk
        datasetIdentifier - alphanumerical id or the dataset name. The id is preferable.
        resourceId - the alphanumerical id of the resource
        Returns:

      • getDatasetList

        public List<String> getDatasetList(Integer limit,
                          Integer offset)
        Parameters:
        limit -
        offset - Starts with 0 included. getDatasetList(1,0) will return exactly one dataset, if catalog is not empty.
        Returns:
        list of data names like i.e. limestone-pavement-orders
        Throws:
        JackanException - on error

      • getDataset

        public CkanDataset getDataset(String id)
        Parameters:
        id - should be the alphanumerical id like 96b8aae4e211f3e5a70cdbcbb722264256ae2e7d. Using the mnemonic like laghi-monitorati-trento is discouraged.
        Throws:
        JackanException - on error

      • getTagList

        public List<CkanTag> getTagList()
        Returns a list of tags names, i.e. "gp-practice-earnings","Aid Project Evaluation", "tourism-satellite-account" We think names SHOULD be lowercase with minuses instead of spaces, but in some cases they aren't.
        Throws:
        JackanException - on error
